title: 115_hr2835
content: PERMANENT LOAN GUARANTEE FEE WAIVERS FOR VETERANS. Section 7(a) of- Small Business Act amended to include guarantee fee waiver for veterans on loans up to $150,000. The spouse of a veteran may be eligible for a guarantee fee waiver on loans up to $150,000 starting from October 1 of the first fiscal year after the enactment of this provision. If the President's budget for the upcoming fiscal year includes a cost for the program above zero, certain requirements may not apply to loans made during that year. The Administrator may waive guarantee fees for loans up to $150,000 for veterans or their spouses starting from October 1 of the first fiscal year after enactment. If the President's budget shows costs above zero, certain loan requirements may not apply for that year. The Administrator can waive guarantee fees for loans up to $150,000 for veterans or their spouses starting from October 1 of the first fiscal year after enactment. If the program cost is above zero, certain loan requirements may not apply for that year. The President's budget for the upcoming fiscal year may impact the requirements for express loans under the program established in the subsection.
